import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Collapse, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, UncontrolledDropdown, NavLink, } from "reactstrap"; import './nav-bar.css' import logo from '../../../Assets/Images/App/app-logo.png'; import vietnam_icon from '../../../Assets/Images/Icons/vietnam.png' import bell_icon from '../../../Assets/Images/Icons/bell.png' import axios from "axios"; function NavBar({setShowLogin, setShowSignUp, user, setUser}) { const [collapseOpen] = React.useState(false); let buttons; let avatar; const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.clear(); setUser(null) } useEffect(() => { if (user){ // Get user avatar axios.get('/uploads/images/users/' + user.Avatar, {responseType: 'arraybuffer'}).then(result => { console.log(Buffer.from(result.data, 'binary').toString('base64')); }).catch(err => { console.log(err); }); } }, [user]); if (user){ buttons = (
e.preventDefault()} >
e.preventDefault()}>
Profile Played games Friends Records Log out e.preventDefault()} >
Vietnamese English Japanese
) } else { buttons = (
e.preventDefault()} >
Vietnamese English Japanese
) } return (
{buttons}
); } export default NavBar;
